relation: North ramp from hangar B to hangar G closed to aircraft over 12500 lbs.
When air traffic control tower closed be alert for intmt vehicular traffic in airport operations areas.
Birds; deer and other wildlife on and in vicinity of airport.
Glider operations by written apvl only; contact airport manager 217-428-2423. glider operations allowed on runways 06 and 30 only. No sod operations.
Snow removal operations in progress winter months; vehicle operators will be monitoring CTAF; aircraft landing/departure use CTAF when air traffic control tower closed.
Runway 12 and runway 18 approach ends are closely aligned. runway 06 and runway 36 approach ends are closely aigned. Verify correct runway and compass heading prior to departure.
(LAHSO_ALD, runway 24) runway 24 secondary lahso 8,000 ft hold short of runway 18/36.

24 hours prior permission required for unsked air carrier operations with more than 30 passenger seats please call airport manager 217-428-2423 or 217-428-8836. Prior permission required for airport rescue and fire fighting index B please call airport manager.

When air traffic control tower closed HIRL runway 06/24 preset low intensity; to incr intensity and activate MIRL runways 12/30 and 18/36; PAPI runway 30, REIL runway 36, taxiway lights and MALSR runway 06 - CTAF.
